channel.title: [474] Need Some Shop Help [474]
channel.description:
I'm playing around with a 474 fixing up a few bugs getting ready for release and I was going to do some sort of a "Seasonal shop". Here in the next month it'll be Christmas, so I put the Santa character, but you can only talk to him. How would I make it so when you talk to him, he trades?
All help is appreciated :)

item.title: [474] Need Some Shop Help [474]
item.dc:creator: @g2uypie g2uypie
item.description:
